definitions.body: enclosures (in Egypt), perhaps court-yards, or cattle-yards, distinct from houses and from fields Ex 8:9 (J).

court of private house 2Sa 17:l8 (containing well), cf. Ne 8:16; of a palace, [[חָחֵר הָאַחֶרֶת]] 1Ki 7:8 the other court, immediately surrounding palace, so called in distinct. from [[הַגְּדוֹלָה]] ´[[ח]]([[הֶ]]) v:1Ki 7:9, v:1Ki 7:12 the great court, including ´[[הא]] ´[[ח]] and [[הַפְּנִימִית]] ´[[הֶח]] of temple (v.

definitions.body: ) in one great enclosure (v. Sta:Salomos Bauten, ZAW 1883. 152 f.); 2Ki 20:4 (Qr Vrss The Kmp Klo al.; Kt Ke al. definitions.title: b.

[[הָעֶלְיוֹן]] ´[[הֶח]] Je 36:10 (v. Gf), and [[הַכּׂהֲנִים]] ´[[ח]] 2Ch 4:9 (where also [[הָעֲזׇרָה הַגְּדוֹלָה]], as oft. Ezek., also [[דְּלָתוֹת לָעֲזׇרָה]]); outer court ´[[הֶח]] [[הַחִיחׂנׇה]] Ez Eze 10:5 = [[הַחֲדָשָׁה]] ´[[הֶח]] 2Ch 20:5; v. further 1Ki 8:64 = 2Ch 7:7, 2Ch 24:21, 2Ch 29:16, Je 19:14, Je 26:2, Ez Eze 8:7; two courts 2Ki 21:5 = 2Ch 33:5, 2Ki 23:12; courts Ez Eze 9:7, 1Ch 28:12, 2Ch 23:5, Ne 8:1, Ne 8:6, Ne 13:7; oft. poet., courts of ´[[י]] Is 1:12, Is 62:9 ([[קדשׁי]] ´[[ח]]), Zec 3:7, Ps 65:5, Ps 84:3, Ps 84:11, Ps 96:8, Ps 100:4, Ps 116:19, Ps 135:2

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: courts of Ezek.'s temple Ez Eze 40:14 + 38 t. Ez Eze 40–Eze 46 (of these rd. [[הַשַּׁעַר]] for [[החחר]] Eze 40:19, Eze 40:32 with LXX Hi Co; and [[החיחון]] for [[החחר]] Eze 41:15 with LXX Ew Co).
